Notes

Third pressing of 31,254 copies. Record 1 (A/B) is on "Baby Pink" vinyl and record 2 (C/D) is on "Piss Yellow" vinyl. The jacket features die cuts on front/back, spot gloss UV coating on both sides, and glossy yellow inner printing. Includes a full color, folded 12" x 24" insert with lyrics and a MP3 download code coupon.
